noun.description: A member of a people inhabiting Swaziland and parts of eastern Transvaal.
The Nguni language of the Swazi, an official language in Swaziland and South Africa.

adjective.description: Relating to Swaziland, the Swazis, or their language.

origin: From the name of Mswati, a 19th-century king of the Swazis.
